name: bluem
description:
bluem is the 2D cinematic adventure game of a robot and a cat in a dark rainy world.
The robot obtains an umbrella and begins journey by rescuing a cat from the rain.

Features

  • Only moving and simple action controls
  • Graphics that make full use of light
  • Action and puzzle using the umbrella
  • No game over, no enemies, and no words

The echoing sound of the rain, the steady scenery, and the hazy light tell us of the beauty of this world.

Concentrate on your senses.

Note: The game will finish about 30 minutes. Please purchase only if you are convinced.
